textarea: * [[proofwiki:{{{id}}}|{{FULLPAGENAME}}]] at ProofWiki<noinclude> *Usage: <nowiki>{{ProofWiki|id=PageIdentifier}}</nowiki> :''PageIdentifier'' is the url address of the page. :Note: ProofWiki.com may not satisfy [[WP:RS]], so in most cases this template should only be used in the '''External links''' section of an article. *Example: <nowiki>{{ProofWiki|id=Tychonoff's_Theorem}}</nowiki> </noinclude>
